author: francescobrivio
body:
#### PR description:
First step of resolving https://github.com/cms-AlCaDB/AlCaTools/issues/95:
 - Added a new `SimBeamSpotHLLHC` CondFormat and relative record
    - Also added all the needed utilities to write/read/plot/inspect/test the new object
- Updated `HLLHCEvtVtxGenerator` plugin adding the possibility to read the smearing parameters from the DB 
- Removed the `CrabKissing` parameters:
  - Removing `HLLHC_CK` and `HLLHC_CK14TeV` scenarios which are not used anywhere in CMSSW and are not even supported by any c++ code since #16942

#### PR validation:
Code compiles and I ran successfully a few upgrade workflows.

#### Backport:
Not a backport, no backport needed.
title: Add new SimBeamSpotHLLHC CondFormat
